mdRecord.dcterms:title: Behind the German veil: a record of a journalistic war pilgrimage / by J. M. de Beaufort (Count Van Maurik de Beaufort) with illustrations and maps
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Beaufort, J. M. de.
Joseph M. Bruccoli Great War Collection (University of Virginia)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 7 p. l., xiii-xix, 403 p. front., plates, ports., maps (part fold.) facsims. 21 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Reprinted in part from the Quarterly review, London daily telegraph and London Sunday pictorial. cf. Author's acknowledgment.

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Stamp of Islesboro Book Club. Bookplates of the Public Library, Dark Harbor, Maine and W. A. Butterfield, Bookseller, Boston, Mass. Bruccoli Great War Collection. Gift of Matthew J. Bruccoli and Charles E. Bailey, September, 1997.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--Personal narratives.
World War, 1914-1918--Germany.
